attributes.action: Prevent the proposed discrimination of the children of graduates being discriminated against on UCAS forms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This autumm under proposed changes by UCAS (supported by the government) children of graduates will have to declare the fact on their UCAS form. This is intended to help children of non graduates to earn a place at university, but will in fact discriminate against the children of graduates (many of whom themselves are first generation graduates). University selection should be on merit, not on who your parents are, or what they have done.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
